solution_line_template: The amount she spends on buying drinks is ${drink_unit_cost}*{num_drinks}= $<<{drink_unit_cost}*{num_drinks}={cost_drinks}>>{cost_drinks}.
The amount she spends on buying cakes is ${cake_unit_cost}*{num_cakes}= $<<{cake_unit_cost}*{num_cakes}={cost_cakes}>>{cost_cakes}.
The amount she spends on buying ice creams is ${ice_cream_unit_cost}*{num_ice_creams}=$<<{ice_cream_unit_cost}*{num_ice_creams}={cost_ice_creams}>>{cost_ice_creams}.
The total amount she spends is ${cost_drinks}+${cost_cakes}+${cost_ice_creams}=$<<{cost_drinks}+{cost_cakes}+{cost_ice_creams}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
